info.author: cmdmvd
info.description: # Kivy Cupertino A collection of iOS style widgets for Kivy. Kivy Cupertino is currently in **alpha** version. Many widgets are not yet implemented and stability is not guaranteed [![Open Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-raw/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino?label=open%20issues)](https://github.com/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino/issues) [![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino)](https://github.com/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino/blob/main/LICENSE) [![Last Commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino)](https://github.com/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino/commits/main) [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/kivy-cupertino/badge/?version=latest)](https://kivy-cupertino.rtfd.io) [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/kivycupertino)](https://pepy.tech/project/kivycupertino) ## Installation Install Kivy Cupertino via `pip` ```shell pip install kivycupertino ``` ### Dependencies - [Kivy](https://kivy.org/doc/stable/gettingstarted/installation.html) - [Python 3](https://www.python.org/downloads/) ## Examples Check out the [Showcase app](https://github.com/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino/blob/main/examples/showcase.py) for an example of all widgets in Kivy Cupertino ## Widgets | Widget | Status | |--------|--------| | Action Sheet | ‚úî | | Activity Indicator | üìù | | Alert Dialog | ‚úî | | Button | ‚úî | | Icon Button | üöß | | Label | ‚úî | | Navigation Bar | ‚úî | | Progress Bar | ‚úî | | Search Bar | üìù | | Segmented Controls | ‚úî | | Slider | üìù | | Stepper | ‚úî | | Switch | ‚úî | | System Button | ‚úî | | Text Field | ‚úî | | Text View | ‚úî | ### Key ‚úî Added \ üöß Work in Progress \ üìù Planned ## Contributing To help improve this project, [fork our repository](https://github.com/cmdvmd/kivy-cupertino/fork)
info.name: kivycupertino
